text: Va har guna kinaero az dilason ʙarmekanem. Nahrho dar zeri pojason corist. Gujand: «Sukr Xudoro, ki moro ʙa in roh rahʙari karda va agar moro rahʙari nakarda ʙud, rohi xud namejoftem. Rasuloni Parvardigori mo ʙa haq omadand. Va on goh onhoro ovoz dihand, ki ʙa ivazi korhoe, ki mekarded, in ʙihistro ʙa sumo dodaand!»
